job description:
Data Analyst
If you are a Business Intelligence Analyst with experience, please read on!

We are thrilled to announce we are looking for a Business Intelligence Analyst to help us in our continuous growth and goals of launching new and exciting new electronic products! If you are looking to work with hot technology with a great team and company, this is the giant leap in your career path
Top Reasons to Work with Us
1. AMAZING benefit structure (FULLY PAID BENEFITS - POO) + Unlimited PTO
2. Competitive compensation package which includes Medical, Dental and Vision
3. High growth opportunity - We promote from within our organization
What You Will Be Doing
- Develop and prove hypotheses that generate critical insights
- Conduct in-depth analysis and develop deep understanding of key value drivers to identify improvement areas and opportunities
- Manage the board presentation process & deadlines
- Work across the organization to deliver financial forecasts
What You Need for this Position
- 2+ years in a highly analytical role at a fast growing company (preferably SaaS experience)
- Fluent in SQL / Big Query
- Team oriented mindset and the ability to work with a wide range of individuals
- Strong statistical foundation with experience using advanced statistical techniques and predictive modeling
What's In It for You
- Vacation/PTO
- Medical
- Dental
- Vision
- Relocation
- Bonus
- 401k
So, if you are a Business Intelligence Analyst with strong SQL Server experience, please apply today!
-

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.



CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
